name: Space resurector
description:
Resurect old satellites from ex-USSR and other countries to attack vilains.

Tutorial : 

  1. Type "start"
  2. Type satellite names to resurect them
  3. Once they accost your ship, type "attack" so they can defend your ship

Known issues : 

  • Unbalanced game (sometimes too many ennemies spawn) : type "restart"
  • Satellite names starting with "mars..." sometime can't be typed
  • The input field may lose focus if you click outside it or hit enter : click the ship so you can type again in field
